title: Home | Chiropractor in Wading River, NY | Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center
description: Home in Wading River, NY. Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center is your local Chiropractor in Wading River serving all of your needs. Call us today at (631)-345-3035 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center Your Wading River Chiropractor Call us at (631)-345-3035 today. For more information or to schedule an appointment with our Wading River chiropractor, call (631)-345-3035 today! Dr. Jon Brodbeck is a chiropractor serving Wading River and the surrounding area. Our chiropractor and the rest of the welcoming team at Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center are committed to providing chiropractic solutions to address your unique needs, whether you are experiencing back pain, neck pain, headaches, or even muscular tightness and tension. You may be searching for pain relief after an accident, experiencing an injury, or if you suffer from a specific condition like chronic back pain or a spinal condition. Even if you looking to improve your overall health, our chiropractor can help you attain your everyday wellness goals! Visit our testimonials page to find out what our patients are saying about our Wading River chiropractor and our chiropractic care plans. At your first visit to Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center, Dr. Jon Brodbeck will explain how chiropractic care works and give you a full evaluation to see if our chiropractic solutions are a good fit to address your needs. If there is a good fit, we can customize a plan of chiropractic care for your condition and health goals. If you have not been to a chiropractor before and want to find out more, please [email us](/contact) or call (631)-345-3035 to receive the answers to your questions from our experienced team. We also welcome referrals, so we invite you to share our chiropractic and wellness information with your friends and loved ones. If you would like to stay informed about the latest in chiropractic care or if you want to start receiving free articles about health and wellness news, subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. We also offer a community content area, which includes wellness articles and other healthcare resources. Dr. Jon Brodbeck Wading River Chiropractor | Brodbeck Chiropractic & Natural Healing Center | (631)-345-3035 5976
